title: RewFrew
author: RewFrew
content: Stake.com largest crypto casino has been reportedly hacked for $41.3m. Stake.com was very secure and trusted gambling site. They always tried to secure their users but hackers break the security. Hackers get $41.3m. Now we have to wait to know good news. I think expected team of stake.com are hardly trying to get back their fund and back for site. I think it will be solved within short time. Source link- https://captainaltcoin.com/worlds-largest-crypto-casino-stake-com-suffers-41-3-million-hack/

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: I see there is already a thread that makes it @rohang here : Stake.com Hot wallet robbed for 16Million + usdAnd have shared it on stake.com's own thread.Sad to see one of the biggest casinos suffer such a bad fate, only the Ethereum network is temporarily suspended while the rest of the withdrawal functions are normal.Maybe anyone here can confirm their withdrawals other than ETH are running normally?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You can continue to post on this first thread:Stake.com Hot wallet robbed for 16Million + usd: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465626.msg62794441#msg62794441

Just i seen it. Can i delete this topic?No, just lock it.Scroll down this thread and you will see 'lock topic' at the low left side beside move topic.
